article_html: All music was banned in northern Mali in 2012 by Islamist militants. But musicians such as Songhoy Blues and Khaira Arby refused to accept it, joining together under the banner They Will Have To Kill Us First
text: All music was banned in northern Mali in 2012 by Islamist militants. But musicians such as Songhoy Blues and Khaira Arby refused to accept it, joining together under the banner They Will Have To Kill Us First
title: The Guardian documentary
